original_text: “While I was thinking about the horns, there before me was another horn, a little one, which came up among them; and three of the first horns were uprooted before it. This horn had eyes like the eyes of a human being and a mouth that spoke boastfully.
korean_text: 내가 그 뿔을 유심히 보는 중에 다른 작은 뿔이 그 사이에서 나더니 첫 번째 뿔 중의 셋이 그 앞에서 뿌리까지 뽑혔으며 이 작은 뿔에는 사람의 눈 같은 눈들이 있고 또 입이 있어 큰 말을 하였더라

sentences.original_text: While I was thinking about the horns
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그 뿔들에 대해 생각하는 동안

sentences.original_text: there before me was another horn
sentences.korean_translation: 내 앞에 또 다른 뿔이 있었는데

sentences.original_text: and three of the first horns were uprooted before it
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 첫 번째 뿔 중 세 개가 그것 앞에서 뽑혔다

sentences.original_text: This horn had eyes like the eyes of a human being
sentences.korean_translation: 이 뿔은 사람의 눈과 같은 눈을 가졌다

sentences.original_text: and a mouth that spoke boastfully
